channel.title: OptimusScape need some help :P
channel.description: So I want to make the "Jump-to Stepping Log" workable on the Trouble Brewing place. Cause I want to make a zombie game in there, I need to know how to activate does Stepping logs and their correct gfx, and how to make that zone multi-combat

item.title: OptimusScape need some help :P
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

  1. not sure what this stepping log does, but if you step up on it its just a gfx and anim or whatever. Have it use the gfx and anim and walk from point a to point b.
  2. to make an area multi combat you add it to the multi combat method in player/playerassistant class

Read full topic
